entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
